body:
Comment 1: 
Just found that this is also the case for other errors. Added example.

geertjohan@Foizetux:~$ go run cgoIncorrectLineNumberError.go 
# command-line-arguments
cgoIncorrectLineNumberError.go:25: cannot convert s (type string) to type unsafe.Pointer
Attachments: 1. cgoIncorrectLineNumberError.go (724 bytes)
